channel.title: Photoplay on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Photoplay on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Build Your Stash Holiday Cardmakers*
item.description: I’m back today with another card following the October sketch at Build Your Stash Holiday Cardmakers. I really love this sketch and could see going back to it a lot to use up some of my patterned papers. Have you played along yet? I made this one a little more simple with only one embossed layer and used a stamped image as the second panel. I might have cheated a bit with that.

item.title: *CAS Colours & Sketches #487*
item.description: There’s a new sketch challenge at CAS Colours & Sketches. This is a great sketch to showcase a little bit of patterned paper or an embossed panel… or keep it just a solid colour. There are so many options! I saw this sketch and immediately wanted to use this beautiful Stampin' Up! paper from last year. It took a while for me to decide what to do with the other element on the card but I landed on the gnome and I like how it turned out!
